PHRASE.LANG: Brutus the dog is a handful to care for, thankfully he keeps his mischief to himself inside of his playpen. This is an Active Item. [#Legal]
S'occuper de Brutus le chien est épuisant, mais heureusement pour vous il fait ses bêtises uniquement dans son parc. [#Legal]
Der Hund Brutus fordert viel Aufmerksamkeit. Zum Glück benimmt er sich nur in seinem Auslauf schlecht. [#Legal]
Stare dietro a il cane Brutus è piuttosto impegnativo. Per fortuna, si limita a fare pasticci all'interno del suo box. [#Legal]
Brutus el perro da bastante trabajo; por suerte, se reserva sus travesuras para sí mismo dentro de su corralito. [#Legal]
Brutus the dog is a handful to care for, thankfully he keeps his mischief to himself inside of his playpen. This is an Active Item. [#Legal]
